summary: This is a grand jury subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to Expedia Group, demanding records related to flights purchased, booked, or taken by Ghislaine Maxwell. The document includes a request for non-disclosure to preserve the confidentiality of the ongoing criminal investigation.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: Issued the grand jury subpoena to Expedia Group as part of a criminal investigation, requesting flight records for Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual whose flight records are being subpoenaed by the grand jury as part of a federal criminal investigation.

connections.description: Berman, as U.S. Attorney, is leading the grand jury investigation that is subpoenaing flight records related to Maxwell.

events.title: Scheduled grand jury appearance for Expedia
events.description: Expedia Group was commanded to appear before the grand jury to testify and produce records, though personal appearance could be waived if records were produced by the return date.

events.title: Issuance of grand jury subpoena to Expedia
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office issued a grand jury subpoena to Expedia Group for flight records related to Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Manhattan, New York
One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A federal grand jury subpoena was issued to Expedia Group on January 24, 2020, demanding all records related to flights purchased, booked, or taken by Ghislaine Maxwell.
The investigation involves alleged violations of 18 U.S.C. ยง 2423(a), which relates to transportation of minors for illegal sexual activity.
The U.S. Attorney's Office requested Expedia not to disclose the existence of the subpoena to any third party to preserve the confidentiality of the investigation.
The subpoena indicates an active federal criminal investigation into Ghislaine Maxwell's travel activities as of early 2020.
